subject: github URL changed from "didnotread" to "tosdr"
text:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Hi!

contributors, please note that all our github repos moved from https://github.com/didnotread to:

    https://github.com/tosdr/

In particular, the main (website) repo moved to:

    https://github.com/tosdr/tosdr.org

If you see any old links anywhere, then please update them. You will also have to update the .git/config file in your local repo copies. Everybody should hopefully have the same access to all the repos as they had before, but if not, or there are any technical problems arising, let me know! :)

At the same time we moved the "main" location of the website to:

    http://tosdr.org/

We will keep tos-dr.info working as well for at least the near future, but if you have any links to our page, then please update them to "tosdr.org" for consistency.


Cheers!
Michiel.
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
